// Registers
R0 000
R1 001
R2 010
R3 011
R4 100
R5 101
R6 110
R7 111
//Instructions OpCodes
NOP 00000
SETC 00001
CLRC 00010
CLR 00011
NOT 00100
INC 00101
DEC 00110
NEG 00111
OUT 01000
IN 01001
MOV 01010
ADD 01011
SUB 01100
AND 01101
OR 01110
IADD 01111
SHL 10000
SHR 10001
RLC 10010
RRC 10011
PUSH 10100
POP 10101
LDM 10110
LDD 10111
STD 11000
JZ 11001
JN 11010
JC 11011
JMP 11100
CALL 11101
RET 11110
DECSP 11111
